Uses of Class
org.klojang.jdbc.SQLExpression

Packages that use SQLExpression
Package
Description
org.klojang.jdbc
Database utilities aimed at providing a quick route for database data to be inserted into Klojang templates.

  • Uses of SQLExpression in org.klojang.jdbc

    Methods in org.klojang.jdbc that return SQLExpression
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static SQLExpression
    SQL.expression(String expression)
    Returns a special string wrapper object whose type signals to Klojang JDBC that the specified string is to be treated as a native SQL expression and hence must not be quoted or escaped.
    SQLExpression
    Quoter.sqlFunction(String name, Object... args)
    Generates a SQL function call in which each of the function arguments is escaped and quoted using the quoteValue() method.
    default SQLExpression
    SQLSession.sqlFunction(String name, Object... args)
    Generates a SQL function call in which each of the function arguments is escaped and quoted using the quoteValue() method.
